title: Derek Merrin
added: Merrin voted for controversial [[Ohio House Bill 6 (2019)|Ohio House Bill 6]] after receiving campaign donations from First Energy Corp PAC<ref name=":0">{{Cite web|title=DeWine pushes for removal of House speaker during bribery case|url=https://www.toledoblade.com/local/politics/2020/07/22/DeWine-pushes-further-for-removal-of-House-speaker-Householder-during-bribery-case/stories/20200722126|access-date=2021-02-03|website=The Blade|language=en}}</ref> Merrin also voted for Larry Householder, the alleged mastermind behind the $61M bribery and racketeering scheme associated with HB6, for Speaker of the House.<ref name=":0" />
